text: anriyum, en camukattavarkale! Itarkaka (allahvin kattalaiyai etuttuc colvatarkaka) nan unkalitam entap porulaiyum ketkavillai; ennutaiya kuli allahvitameyanri (unkalitam) illai; enave iman kontavarkalai (avarkal nilai eppati iruppinum) nan viratti vitupavan allan; niccayamaka avarkal tam iraivanai (nanmaiyutan) cantippavarkalaka irukkinranar; anal unkalaiye arivilla camukattavarkalakave nan kankiren
